data.introduce: 该接口用于出票后，基于票号查询销售客票数据的详细信息。对应黑屏RTKT指令的结构化版本接口。
data.business: 该接口用于出票后，基于票号查询销售客票数据的详细信息。
data.functions: 出票后，基于票号查询客票数据结构化信息。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirOpenRTKTRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票销售数据查询请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码。Office代码：BJS191","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"客票票号","children":[]},{"name":"Options","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求选项","children":[{"name":"TicketsSalesInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"查询当前请求票号的销售数据开关","children":[]},{"name":"TicketsRefundInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"查询当前请求票号的退票数据开关","children":[]},{"name":"OriginalSalesInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"查询当前请求票号的所有换开旧票数据开关","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Time","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"通用时间。20220508 223000；yyyymmdd hh24mmss","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"版本号。1.0","children":[]}]}]
